abstract: Even a report that showed sales of existing homes had been nudged up in November failed to lift the market as traders closed their books on the year.
snippet: Even a report that showed sales of existing homes had been nudged up in November failed to lift the market as traders closed their books on the year.
lead_paragraph: Stocks fell on Monday, ending a tumultuous year that battered financial firms but left other pockets of the market and the world with stunning gains.

headline.main: Stocks Slip, Ending Year of Turmoil
headline.print_headline: Stocks Slip, Ending Year Of Turmoil
